init_hook: if [ ! -x bin/bundle ]; then gem install bundler -v 2.5.14 --no-document; fi

scripts.test:headless: if command -v chromedriver >/dev/null 2>&1 && (command -v chromium >/dev/null 2>&1 || command -v chromium-browser >/dev/null 2>&1 || command -v google-chrome >/dev/null 2>&1); then WEBDRIVER_CHROME_DRIVER=$(command -v chromedriver) CHROME_BIN=$(command -v chromium || command -v chromium-browser || command -v google-chrome) bundle exec rspec; else echo 'Chromium/Chrome + chromedriver not found; skipping headless browser tests.' && exit 0; fi
